thread.title: Vetements Drops Polizei Paneled Leather Racing Jacket for $5,590
thread.title_full: Vetements Drops Polizei Paneled Leather Racing Jacket for $5,590

author: Adam Mark
title: Vetements Drops Polizei Paneled Leather Racing Jacket for $5,590
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
Adding to MR PORTER’s vast range of exclusive designer gear, the London-based multi-brand giant recently unveiled a Polizei-emblazoned leather racing jacket from Vetements for the upcoming spring season. Solidifying the brand’s reputation for the production of provocative, slightly ostentatious pieces, the latest addition features a subtle, paneled Italian leather construction, a cropped box-cut finish, gently padded shoulders, and a full-zip front closure.
Amongst such fine detailing, the jacket features the word Polizei , German for “police,” printed in a contrasting white over the rear yoke, chest and throat latch, with stitched, monochromatic branding over each respective sleeve.
Overall, the Polizei paneled leather racing jacket from Vetements is a considered, well-tailored piece sure to make it onto our upcoming Street Style photo series during this year’s next buying season. Head over to MR PORTER to shop this particular piece for around $5,590, as well as other exciting pieces from Vetements’ latest Spring/Summer 2017 offering.
